import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; export default function ContactUs() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_33qz9vg", // your EmailJS service ID "template_w81wp49", // your EmailJS template ID form.current, "7i6UI18nKRxT-_a2z" // your public key ) .then( () => { alert("‚úÖ Message sent successfully!"); form.current.reset(); }, (error) => { alert("‚ùå Failed to send message. Try again later."); console.error(error.text); } ); }; return (
